GET /api.description: responds with a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: responds with an array of topic objects, each of which should have the properties: slug, description

topics.description: Code is love, code is life

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: responds with an article object by id containing the correct article properties

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Responds with article containing incremented/decremented votes

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: Responds with an array of objects, each object with the sole property `username

GET /api/articles.description: Responds with an array of article objects, each object with the correct properties

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Responds with an array of comments, each containing the correct properties

comments.body: Nobis consequatur animi. Ullam nobis quaerat voluptates veniam.
comments.author: grumpy19

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Responds with comment newly added to the database

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes comment and responds with an empty response body
